subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Andrea Bargnani, not known for his tough play, showed he was not afraid to mix it up with the Nets’ Kevin Garnett, no stranger to on-court confrontations.
snippet: The Knicks’ Andrea Bargnani, not known for his tough play, showed he was not afraid to mix it up with the Nets’ Kevin Garnett, no stranger to on-court confrontations.
